paragraph: Isiah Pinkney, known under the stage name 12 Gauge, is an American rapper from Georgia. He started out as a DJ, moving to rapping in the early 1990s, releasing three full-length albums. He is best known for his only top 40 single "Dunkie Butt", which peaked at 28 on Billboard Hot 100 and earned a gold certification.
12 Gauge (Scotti Bros., 1994) US Billboard 200 peak #141, US R&B peak #44
"Dunkie Butt (Please Please Please)" - Billboard Hot 100 peak #28, Hot Rap Singles peak #3
